citeinfo.origin: TaeKeun Rho and John J. Goering (Ed)
citeinfo.title: 13C and 15N Uptake data in the Bering Sea

descript.abstract: This data will be include 13C uptake and 15N-NO3, 15N-NH4, and 15N-Urea uptake rate in the Southeastern Bering Sea Shelf area. Nutrients and Chlorophyll data are incorporated in Nutrients data section of T.E. Whitledge.
descript.purpose: The data set will be included the 13C and 15N uptake from the May, 1997 Miller Freeman, June-July,1997 Wecoma, September,1997 Miller Freeman, April,1998 Miller Freeman, May,1998 Wecoma, Aug-September Alpha Helix (Inner Front Study/ UCI), May, 1999 Miller Freeman, May-June, 1999 Alpha Helix (Inner Front study/UCI), July-August,1999 Alpha Helix (Inner Front Cruise/UCI)
